issue.title: [Release] Enable and test dataset in the verification script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7752](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7752). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're not testing the dataset feature during the release verification.
